statements: UPDATE website_traffic_data SET page_url = 'example.com/blog' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE website_traffic_data SET duration_seconds = 120, device_type = 'desktop' WHERE user_id = 3;
UPDATE website_traffic_data SET duration_seconds = 120, device_type = 'Desktop' WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE website_traffic_data SET page_url = 'example.com/page2', visit_timestamp = '2022-09-15 08:30:00' WHERE user_id = 54321;
UPDATE user_profiles SET user_name = 'Alice', last_login = '2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE user_id = 101;
UPDATE website_visits SET visited_page = '/about' WHERE visit_id = 201;
UPDATE website_visits SET visited_page = 'home_page' WHERE user_id = 1234 AND visit_id > 100;
UPDATE user_profiles SET user_name = 'John Doe', user_email = 'john.doe@example.com', last_login = '2022-01-01 10:00:00' WHERE user_id = 5678;
UPDATE website_visitors SET visitor_name = 'John Doe' WHERE visitor_id = 1;
UPDATE pages_visited SET time_spent_on_page = '5 minutes' WHERE visit_id = 3;
UPDATE website_visitors SET visitor_name = 'John Doe', visit_timestamp = NOW() WHERE visitor_id = 1;
UPDATE personalized_content SET content_name = 'Featured Article', content_type = 'Article' WHERE content_id = 3;
UPDATE website_visits SET page_url='https://updatedpage1.com' WHERE visit_id=1
UPDATE page_views SET page_views_count=15, visitor_id=3 WHERE page_id=5
UPDATE website_visits SET visit_timestamp = '2022-01-20 13:30:00' WHERE visit_id = 101
UPDATE page_views SET page_views_count = 50, visitor_id = 201 WHERE page_id = 201
UPDATE website_visitors SET visitor_name = 'Alice' WHERE visitor_id = 1;
UPDATE visitor_devices SET device_os = 'iOS' WHERE device_id = 2;
UPDATE website_visitors SET visitor_name = 'John Doe', page_visited = 'Homepage' WHERE visitor_id = 1;
UPDATE visitor_actions SET url_visited = 'example.com/page1', action_type = 'click' WHERE visitor_id = 2;
